definitions.definition: An antiphon or responsory after the epistle, in the Mass, which was sung on the steps, or while the deacon ascended the steps.
A service book containing the musical portions of the Mass.

main_definition: ( Christianity ) An antiphon or responsory after the epistle, in the Mass, which was sung on the steps, or while the deacon ascended the steps.
secondary_definitions: ( Christianity ) A service book containing the musical portions of the Mass.
